titleStmt.title: Vindici√¶ legis: or, A vindication of the morall law and the covenants, from the errours of papists, Arminians, Socinians, and more especially, Antinomians. In XXIX. lectures, preached at Laurence-Jury, London. / By Anthony Burgess, preacher of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Young, for Thomas Underhill, at the signe of the Bible in Wood-street.,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary request to print from the President and fellows of Sion College.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
